getInputLabels

public java.lang.String[] getInputLabels()
Description copied from class: GeoConstruction
Method which retrieves a string array with labels of input elements for this construction. The retrieved array doesn't contain duplicate labels.

Specified by:
getInputLabels in class GeoConstruction
Returns:
Array with labels of input elements.
